PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: D2015/72765--- Address: 6 Woodcote RoadWallingtonSM6 0NN--- Proposal: Erection of a part first floor, part second floor rear extension with beer hatch extension on ground floor and an additional third floor (All viewed as a four storey building from Woodcote Road and a three storey building from rear access) comprising remodelling of all elevations incorporating extract duct, three dormer extension at front and a living wall at side in connection with retention of a public house with courtyard on ground floor (Woodcote Road frontage) use of first floor (ground floor when viewed from rear access) for purposes falling within Class A3 (Food and Drink) and provision of two 1-bedroomed, four 2-bedroomed and two 3-bedroomed self contained flats with balconies together with cycle and refuse facilities serving residential and commercial uses.--- Status: REF--- Decision: REF--- Date Decision Issued: 15-DEC-15---
